data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Gwalior do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 22,352 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Gwalior.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Rajput Baghel (Hindu traditions) people.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the county of Gwalior to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

location.name: Gwalior
location.people_groups_list: Muskhan, Lodha (Hindu traditions), Lora, Alitkar Salankar, Lodha (Muslim traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Muskhan (200), Lodha (Hindu traditions) (6,608,000), Lora (2,900), Alitkar Salankar (800), Lodha (Muslim traditions) (4,100)
